channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- Experion Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- Experion Server

item.title: CVE-2023-24474|2024-08-02T10:56:04.197Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Experion server may experience a DoS due to a heap overflow which could occur when handling a specially crafted message

item.title: CVE-2023-22435|2024-08-02T10:07:06.538Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Experion server may experience a DoS due to a stack overflow when handling a specially crafted message.

item.title: CVE-2023-25948|2024-08-02T11:39:06.184Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server information leak of configuration data when an error is generated in response to a specially crafted message. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-25078|2024-08-02T11:11:43.708Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description:
Server or Console Station DoS due to heap overflow occurring during the handling of a specially crafted message for a specific configuration operation.
See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-23585|2024-08-02T10:35:33.423Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description:
Experion server DoS due to heap overflow occurring during the handling of a specially crafted message for a specific configuration operation.
See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5404|2024-08-02T07:59:44.850Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message can cause a pointer to be overwritten which can result in a remote code execution or failure. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5393|2024-08-02T07:59:44.301Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message that causes a disconnect to a hostname may causing a stack overflow resulting in possible remote code execution. Honeywell recommends updating to the most recent version of the product. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5403|2024-08-02T07:59:44.423Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description:
Server hostname translation to IP address manipulation which could lead to an attacker performing remote code execution or causing a failure.
See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5396|2024-08-02T07:59:44.711Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message creates connection for a hostname that may cause a stack overflow resulting in possible remote code execution. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5398|2024-08-02T07:59:44.650Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message based on a list of IPs resulting in heap corruption causing a denial of service. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5401|2024-08-02T07:59:44.782Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message based on a using the specified key values can cause a stack overflow vulnerability which could lead to an attacker performing remote code execution or causing a failure. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5397|2024-08-02T07:59:44.325Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message to create a new connection could lead to an attacker performing remote code execution or causing a failure. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5400|2024-08-02T07:59:44.742Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message based on a using the specified key values can cause a heap overflow vulnerability which could lead to an attacker performing remote code execution or causing a failure. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5394|2024-08-02T07:59:44.970Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message that where the GCL message hostname may be too large which may cause a stack overflow; resulting in possible remote code execution. Honeywell recommends updating to the most recent version of the product. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5395|2024-08-02T07:59:44.353Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server receiving a malformed message that uses the hostname in an internal table may cause a stack overflow resulting in possible remote code execution. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5406|2024-08-02T07:59:44.668Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server communication with a controller can lead to remote code execution using a specially crafted message from the controller. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5405|2024-08-02T07:59:44.586Z -- honeywell -- experion%20server
item.description: Server information leak for the CDA Server process memory can occur when an error is generated in response to a specially crafted message. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.
